questions: How are the three sectors of the economy different from each other ? Explain.
answers: Primary Sector : Activities undertaken by using natural resources e.g. forestry, agriculture, fishing e.t.c Secondary Sector : Activities includes various manufacturing activities and adds utility to primary sector e.g. Cotton-cloths, iron ore-Steel e.t.c. Tertiary Sector : Includes all such activities which supports primary and secondary sector by providing services e.g. transportation etc.  5
